summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 25th Avenue Northwest and 26th Avenue Northwest, each from West 70th Street to West 75th Street; 27th Avenue Northwest and Earl Avenue Northwest, each from West 65th Street to West 73rd Street; West 70th Street, from 24th Avenue Northwest to 28th Avenue Northwest; and West 73rd Street, from 24th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6462 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
